source.name: Question1
source.instructions: **Select correct answers from the available list**
source.text:
tart = 0
end = list.length – 1
found = False
target = input(“Please enter the number to be searched for.”)
while start <= end <<<AND found == False>>>
	<<<middle = (start + end) DIV 2>>>
	if list[middle] == target then
		found = True
	endif
	if target < alist.middle then
		<<<end = middle – 1>>>
	endif
	if target > alist.middle then
		<<<start = middle + 1>>>
	endif
endwhile
<<<if found == True then>>>
	print(“The search item is in the list.”)
else
	print(“The search item is not in the list.”)
endif
